Andy Mehalick

Software Architect, Engineer, UX Designer

Hi I'm Andy — partner and technical director of Orange Jetpack Studios, I'm currently living and working in beautiful sunny Kuwait. I am a Microsoft Certified Professional Developer and a recent Master of Software Engineering graduate from Pennsylvania State University.

I have a passion for the elegance inherent in well-designed software solutions and the beauty that exists in the software we create. I enjoy working with and evangelizing all of the technologies and patterns that create harmony in my software development life and I enjoy sharing my experiences of discovery with others.

Currently I build web and native mobile applications of all scale with the ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework, SQL Azure, AngularJS, and the Ionic Framework.
